meanings.definition: To change the key or combination of a lock.
meanings.sent1: I will be rekeying the front door lock tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: The locksmith is rekeying the office safe for security purposes.
meanings.sent3: After rekeying the lock, I accidentally locked myself out!
meanings.sent4: Rekeying the lock felt like giving it a fresh start.
meanings.sent5: The process of rekeying made the lock more secure than before.

meanings.definition: The act of creating a new key or combination for a lock.
meanings.sent1: The rekeying of the lock was necessary after the keys were lost.
meanings.sent2: I requested a rekeying of the house locks after moving in.
meanings.sent3: The rekeying service was quick and efficient, saving me time.
meanings.sent4: The rekeying process gave me peace of mind about the security of my home.
meanings.sent5: The locksmith's expertise in rekeying was evident in the quality of work.
